definitions.definition: Insolent boldness , especially when imprudent or unconventional .
examples: The brash private had the audacity to criticize the general.
Somebody never pays his loans, yet he has the audacity to ask the bank for money.

definitions.definition: Fearlessness , intrepidity or daring , especially with confident disregard for personal safety, conventional thought, or other restrictions.

main_definition: Insolent boldness , especially when imprudent or unconventional .
secondary_definitions: Fearlessness , intrepidity or daring , especially with confident disregard for personal safety, conventional thought, or other restrictions.
